org.sword.wechat4j.message
类 CustomerMsg

java.lang.Object
  org.sword.wechat4j.message.CustomerMsg

public class CustomerMsg
extends Object

发送客服消息

作者：
ChengNing

构造方法摘要
CustomerMsg(String toUserOpenId)
          需要主动去刷新access_token,不建议使用 建议自己去获取access_token保存，并定时刷新。
 
方法摘要
 void sendImage(String mediaId)
          发送图片消息 { "touser":"OPENID", "msgtype":"image", "image": { "media_id":"MEDIA_ID" } }
 void sendMusic(MusicResponse music)
          发送音乐消息 { "touser":"OPENID", "msgtype":"music", "music": { "title":"MUSIC_TITLE", "description":"MUSIC_DESCRIPTION", "musicurl":"MUSIC_URL", "hqmusicurl":"HQ_MUSIC_URL", "thumb_media_id":"THUMB_MEDIA_ID" } }
 void sendMusic(String title, String description, String musicURL, String hQMusicUrl, String thumbMediaId)
          发送音乐消息
 void sendNew(String title, String description, String picUrl, String url)
          发送图文消息，单条图文消息
 void sendNews(ArticleResponse item)
          发送图文消息，单条图文消息
 void sendNews(List<ArticleResponse> items)
          发送图文消息 { "touser":"OPENID", "msgtype":"news", "news":{ "articles": [ { "title":"Happy Day", "description":"Is Really A Happy Day", "url":"URL", "picurl":"PIC_URL" }, { "title":"Happy Day", "description":"Is Really A Happy Day", "url":"URL", "picurl":"PIC_URL" } ] } }
 void sendText(String content)
          { "touser":"OPENID", "msgtype":"text", "text": { "content":"Hello World" } }
 void sendVideo(String title, String description, String mediaId, String thumbMediaId)
          发送视频消息
 void sendVideo(VideoResponse video)
          发送视频消息 { "touser":"OPENID", "msgtype":"video", "video": { "media_id":"MEDIA_ID", "thumb_media_id":"MEDIA_ID", "title":"TITLE", "description":"DESCRIPTION" } }
 void sendVoice(String mediaId)
          发送语音消息 { "touser":"OPENID", "msgtype":"voice", "voice": { "media_id":"MEDIA_ID" } }
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造方法详细信息

CustomerMsg

public CustomerMsg(String toUserOpenId)
需要主动去刷新access_token,不建议使用 建议自己去获取access_token保存，并定时刷新。 然后使用SendMsg(String toUserOpenId,String accessToken)来替代本方法

参数：
toUserOpenId -

public void sendVoice(String mediaId)

sendVideo

public void sendVideo(VideoResponse video)

sendMusic

public void sendMusic(MusicResponse music)
发送音乐消息 { "touser":"OPENID", "msgtype":"music", "music": { "title":"MUSIC_TITLE", "description":"MUSIC_DESCRIPTION", "musicurl":"MUSIC_URL", "hqmusicurl":"HQ_MUSIC_URL", "thumb_media_id":"THUMB_MEDIA_ID" } }

参数：
music - 音乐消息

sendNew

public void sendNew(String title,
                    String description,
                    String picUrl,
                    String url)
发送图文消息，单条图文消息

参数：
Title - 图文消息标题
Description - 图文消息描述
PicUrl - 图片链接，支持JPG、PNG格式，较好的效果为大图360*200，小图200*200
Url - 点击图文消息跳转链接

sendNews

public void sendNews(ArticleResponse item)
发送图文消息，单条图文消息

参数：
item -

sendNews

public void sendNews(List<ArticleResponse> items)
发送图文消息 { "touser":"OPENID", "msgtype":"news", "news":{ "articles": [ { "title":"Happy Day", "description":"Is Really A Happy Day", "url":"URL", "picurl":"PIC_URL" }, { "title":"Happy Day", "description":"Is Really A Happy Day", "url":"URL", "picurl":"PIC_URL" } ] } }

参数：
items -
